channel.title: Can some1 tell me how to get the compiler to find my java, files in rigt place's
channel.description:
ok i had this after a frined told me how to do.... then my whle server crashed so now i dont know what to put DONT TELL ME TO PUT WHAT IT SAYS IN THE TUT (1 of the first 4 permenent posts) IT SAYS TO PUT @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
BUT THAT DOESNT WORK ON PVPSCAPE PLEASE HELP ME ON WHAT TO PUT SO IT SAYS Note: stream.java users or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:Deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
SO CAN SOME! PLEASE HELP ON TELLING ME WHAT TO TYPE IN COMPILE <EDIT !!IN PVPSCAPE SERVER!! NOT ANY OTHER SERVER UNLESS U KNOW FOR SURE IT WORKS FOR PVPSCAPE ALSO
if u can, help me on msn or yahoo my email is ahr_az@yahoo.com also if it doesnt show, thats an underscore between the ahr an az

item.title: Can some1 tell me how to get the compiler to find my java, files in rigt place's
item.dc:creator: @alex2916s alex2916s
item.description:
@alex2916s wrote:

ok i had this after a frined told me how to do… then my whle server crashed so now i dont know what to put DONT TELL ME TO PUT WHAT IT SAYS IN THE TUT (1 of the first 4 permenent posts) IT SAYS TO PUT
@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

BUT THAT DOESNT WORK ON PVPSCAPE PLEASE HELP ME ON WHAT TO PUT SO IT SAYS
Note: stream.java users or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:Deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

SO CAN SOME! PLEASE HELP ON TELLING ME WHAT TO TYPE IN COMPILE <EDIT !!IN PVPSCAPE SERVER!! NOT ANY OTHER SERVER UNLESS U KNOW FOR SURE IT WORKS FOR PVPSCAPE ALSO

if u can, help me on msn or yahoo my email is ahr_az@yahoo.com also if it doesnt show, thats an underscore between the ahr an az
